stories.text:
Hello,
I'm a history PhD currently working as a professor and looking for advice on transitioning to a new career. I recently saw a job as a historian/researcher for a video game company and was wondering if anyone has recommendations on finding similar jobs and ways of making myself marketable for these positions. Thanks!
stories.title: Professional Historian Looking for Advice

stories.text:
There are sometimes excellent articles written as Twitter threads like this [1] recently. I see debates frequently happening with some people preferring unrolled versions like [2] and some people preferring the original. Hence this poll. Which do you prefer and why?

[1] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29977041

[2] https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1482811504424542211.html
stories.title: Poll: Do you prefer Twitter threads or unrolled versions?
